transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan ji sir, Amit baat kar raha tha na, main IndiaMART office Noida se, senior manager Chandan ke senior manager se.
Executive: Ji Chandan ji bol rahe hain sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi main Chandan senior manager baat kar raha hun. Actually mein Chandan aapki health issue is vajah se woh leave pe hain sir. Toh sara main abhi uska text care kar raha hun. Hai na? Toh ek baar main jaanna chahunga sir abhi problem kahan pe aa rahi hai aapko first of all. Sir jaise hi main aapka app open karta hun na.
Haan.
Customer: Aapka app open ke baad jo buyleads wala page aata hai na, woh page hi open nahi hota.
Executive: Buyleads ka page open nahi ho raha hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Ek minute bas.
Executive: Sir ek kaam kariye. Main na aapko na ek video meeting ka link share kar raha hun sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: So that ki hum proper sa cheeze check kar payenge aur cheezon ko clear kar payenge sir. Right? Nahi aap mere
Customer: Aap mere login number se login kariye.
Executive: Sir woh right nahi hota sir. Right nahi hota aap try kariye samajhne ka. Right. Main aapko ab mere samne kar lijiye mujhe pata chal jayega ki kahan pe dikkat aa rahi hai so that ki hum usi according.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Dekhiye sir maine aapko share kiya hai sir.
Customer: Amit Kumar ke naam se aaya hoga sir.
Customer: Nahi raha hoga aapke registered email id pe sir.
Customer: Aap mujhe ek second baad dobara call kariye. Actually kya hai na ki mera net jo hai usi number pe chal raha hai. Main wifi range se bahar hun abhi.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha. Toh main aapko aapko thodi der mein connect karun, do minute mein?
Customer: Within nahi, within 6 second mein call kariye. Bas mujhe within switch karna hai dusre system pe bas.
Executive: Okay. Sure sure sure sure. Sir yeh do second baad kariye.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is unable to open buyleads page.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to share a video meeting link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in a few seconds.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, app, technical issue
